section.heading: Exemptions—Sales of cigarettes by Indian retailers

content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.12 > Section 82.12.0316 82.12.0315 << 82.12.0316 >> 82.12.0318 PDF RCW 82.12.0316 Exemptions — Sales of cigarettes by Indian retailers. The provisions of this chapter shall not apply in respect to the use of cigarettes sold by an Indian retailer during the effective period of a cigarette tax contract subject to RCW 43.06.455 or a cigarette tax agreement under RCW 43.06.465 or 43.06.466 . [ 2008 c 228 s 4 ; 2005 c 11 s 4 ; 2001 c 235 s 5 .] NOTES: Authorization for agreement — Effective date — 2008 c 228: See notes following RCW 43.06.466 . Findings — Intent — Explanatory statement — Effective date — 2005 c 11: See notes following RCW 43.06.465 . Intent — Finding — 2001 c 235: See RCW 43.06.450 .
